project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion Command-Line Tool
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line Python tool that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin. The user should be able to specify the input temperature and the desired output unit.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion from Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement temperature conversion from Celsius to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion from Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion from Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion from Kelvin to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion from Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Write tests for each of the conversion functions
Execute tests on all implemented conversion features to ensure that they function correctly
